name: Telegram Group Saver
description: A Telegram to make your leech/mirror group copyright free by @AbirHasan2005

API_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram user session string, get it from @StringSessionGen_Bot

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Your channel username that you want to forcesub

MONGODB_URI.description: Mongo database url get it from https://www.mongodb.com

BOT_TOKEN.description: telegram bot token, get it from @botfather

BLOCKED_EXTENSIONS.description: blocked files extension that will not get deleted.
BLOCKED_EXTENSIONS.value: srt txt jpg jpeg png torrent html aio pdf

DB_CHANNEL_ID.description: Your private channel id for database. In that channel bot will save files.
